text: Ceroplesis hecate is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Chevrolat in 1855. It is known from Angola, Benin, the Democratic Republic of the Congo, Cameroon, Ghana, Gabon, Nigeria, the Ivory Coast, and Uganda.BioLib.cz - Ceroplesis hecate. title: Ceroplesis hecate
